''[[Madlax]]'' is a 26-episode [[anime]] [[television series]] produced in [[2004 in television|2004]] by the [[Bee Train]] animation studio. Its original soundtrack was created by the well-known composer [[Yuki Kajiura]], partly in collaboration with [[Yuuka Nanri]] (as part of [[FictionJunction Yuuka]]).
